about_the_game:
Japan Trip is a captivating visual novel that takes you on an unforgettable adventure through the bustling streets of Tokyo, where every corner holds new experiences and every encounter could change your life forever. You’ve arrived in Japan’s vibrant capital city, looking for something more—more excitement, more connection, and maybe even more love. But as you explore Tokyo’s bright lights and hidden corners, you soon discover that it’s not just the stunning cityscape that has your heart racing—it’s the people you meet along the way.

Tokyo is full of fascinating personalities, and soon you find yourself drawn into the lives of several intriguing women, each offering a unique perspective on life, love, and everything in between. Your journey is filled with choices, and each one could bring you closer to a heartfelt connection—or a hilariously awkward misstep. Will you find romance amidst the whirlwind energy of Tokyo, or will the city’s complexities leave you tangled in a web of charming chaos?

Meet the Characters:

  • The Sweet Country Girl: She’s left her small village behind, coming to Tokyo with big dreams and wide-eyed wonder. She’s just as overwhelmed by the city as you are, and her innocence and sincerity make her a refreshing change from the fast-paced life of the metropolis. Together, you might just find the comfort of home in the middle of the neon-lit chaos.

  • The Lady Boss: She’s a sharp, no-nonsense businesswoman who commands respect in the boardroom but harbors a secret longing for something more personal. As your boss, she’s all about results—until she starts seeing you in a different light. Will you dare to get closer to this corporate shark, or will you keep things strictly professional?

  • The Wild Party Girl: A whirlwind of energy with a rebellious streak, she lives for the night, the music, and the thrill of Tokyo’s underground scene. With her ever-changing style and love for karaoke, she’s a bundle of contradictions—unpredictable, fiery, and a little dangerous. Can you keep up with her pace, or will she leave you dizzy with her antics?

  • The Mysterious Heiress: She lives a life of luxury, but there’s an air of solitude around her. She’s elegant, composed, and always in control—but beneath the surface, she’s curious about you and your perspective on life. She might even want to bring you into her world… but are you ready to be treated like her personal pet?

  • The Nightlife Diva: A star of Tokyo’s secret nightlife, she’s seen the city’s shadows as well as its lights. Her path hasn’t been easy, and she carries the scars of her past with quiet grace. But there’s something alluring about her world-weary wisdom and her ability to navigate Tokyo’s hidden side. Are you brave enough to dive into the underworld of Tokyo with her?

Features:

  • Engaging Storyline: Experience a rich narrative that combines romance, humor, and drama, set against the backdrop of Tokyo’s electrifying nightlife and serene cultural sites.

  • Character-Driven Interactions: Develop deep, meaningful relationships with five unique women, each with their own story to tell and secrets to uncover.

  • Multiple Endings: Your choices matter! Shape the story and your relationships, leading to multiple possible endings with each character.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully illustrated scenes that capture both the bustling energy of Tokyo and its more intimate, quiet moments.

  • Animated Intimate Scenes: Enjoy fully animated adult scenes that bring each encounter to life with fluid motion and sensual detail.

  • Lush Soundtrack: Set the mood with a rich, atmospheric soundtrack that perfectly complements each moment, from tender conversations to pulse-pounding nights out.

highlighted.name: Metal Chaos: The Armored Machine Hammer
Secrets Under the Office Desk: The Art of Combining Work and Intimate Pleasures
The Secret Club of Friendly Privilege
Success on Stage: The audience clapped and we took a breath!
Triple high: one is good, but three is a joy!
The ‘It's not a joke, it's just something we decided’ ending
I can tell you haven't been in combat yet!
The end again, but with a companion!

content_descriptors.notes:
Warning: 'Japan Trip' contains adult content. It features sexual characters, erotic scenes, nudity, and sexual acts. 
It does not contains  drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or suicide. Recommended for players aged 18 and above.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Japan Trip

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Prepare to be swept away by the enchanting allure of Tokyo's nightlife, where neon lights illuminate the path to unexpected encounters and unforgettable experiences.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
